Description:
Responsibilities:Strategy Development: Craft and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to amplify the brand's presence in target markets.
Social Media Management: Oversee all brand social media platforms, ensuring consistent messaging, engagement with followers, and content curation.
Influencer Collaboration: Identify, negotiate, and manage partnerships with influencers, ensuring alignment with the brand's image and objectives.
Affiliate Program Oversight: Launch and manage the brand's affiliate program, ensuring effective recruitment, support, and performance tracking of affiliates.
Ad Campaigns: Design, initiate, and monitor paid advertising campaigns, ensuring optimal ROI and brand visibility.
Performance Analysis: Regularly evaluate and report on the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.
Brand Consistency: Ensure all marketing efforts, across all channels, align with the brand's voice, image, and objectives.
Team Collaboration: Coordinate with other departments to align marketing strategies, product launches, and promotions.Skills
Skills:
Skills: Strong analytical skills, proficiency in social media platforms, adept in influencer collaboration, and a keen eye for aesthetics.
Education: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. A Master's degree would be a plus.
Certifications: Any additional certifications in Digital Marketing, Content Creation, or related fields would be advantageous.
